Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We have observed that you are currently still using the older IXM WEB and Device Firmware versions. Please note that Invixium <will stop supporting/has stopped supporting> all versions prior to version 1.5.0.0 from <Date when support will stop/has stopped>.
We request you to upgrade to the latest IXM WEB and Firmware versions for continued support. You can refer to the “Upgrading Device Firmware” and “Upgrading IXM WEB” documents available on the Customer Portal in case of any confusion on how to upgrade.
Best Regards,
Invixium Support Team
